subject: You are approved!  Thu, 10 May 2007 12:04:24 -0500
body:
Dear Homeowner,

Are you still paying too much mortgage interest?  Refinance us better rate.  Act now on your loan pre-approval.

You can receive $260,000 for
$652 per month save 41%.

Please submit Now. 
http://ilook.tw/malg9

Alexandra Arthur
New Lenders 


"I wanted to do something nice so I bought my mother-in-law a chair. Now they won't let me plug it in." -- Henny Youngman
